ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectCanada Lands Company Limited's 2022-23 to 2026-27 Corporate Plan and 2022-23 Operating and Capital Budgets
PrecisOrder (1) authorizing the Old Port of Montr√©al Corporation Inc. to enter into up to 20 leases in 2022-23, having individual values of up to $2,000,000.00 per year, and a total value of up $81,000,000.00 and to retain and use any associated proceeds, if the leases are consistent with activities and projections presented in the corporate plan for the 2022-23 to 2026-27 planning period; and (2) authorizing Parc Downsview Park Inc. to enter into up to 20 leases in 2022-23, having individual values of up to $4,000,000.00 per year, and a total value of up to $57,500,000.00 and to retain and use any associated proceeds, if the leases are consistent with activities and projections presented in the corporate plan for the 2022-23 to 2026-27 planning period.
